name: The Inconvenience Store
description:
First day on the job and wouldn't you know you're the only one there! Scrambling to save your ratings, how long can you last?

This was our team's, Inc. Convenience, first Game Jam (Ludum Dare 50) and thus it was made in 72 hours. Hope you enjoy!

Credits:
James, Will, Kaveen, Wende, Jack.
(thank you all so much for making this possible)
Sounds are found online as well as the toilet, sink, toilet paper, & register models.
